scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:img && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:img & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp src/index.html build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar src/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && lessc --source-map src/css/index.less build/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.css && cp src/css/reset.css build/
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'src/css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.build:img: npm run clean:img && cp -r src/img/ build/
